at.irian.ankor.switching.routing

Interface ModelAddress

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SocketModelAddress, StatefulSessionModelAddress, StatelessSessionModelAddress, WebSocketModelAddress

    public interface ModelAddress
    A ModelAddress uniquely references a named model on the local system or a remote system. Concrete implementations of a ModelAddress are always associated with a concrete Connector so that the Switchboard knows how to transmit messages to the (local or remote) model that is referenced by this ModelAddress.
